-829704702:
◆ Pure Fiction ◆
Pure Fiction contains a series of challenging stages. In this mode, you need to challenge the stages and earn the required number of points to pass the challenge and get splendid rewards. In addition, you will get bonus rewards for achieving specific targets. The difficulty and rewards of Pure Fiction stages are not affected by your Equilibrium Level.

Stages and rewards in Pure Fiction are regularly updated.

You will be cut off from the outside world when entering the Pure Fiction, with the following actions temporarily disabled:
● Changing team setup
● Changing, leveling up or ascending Light Cones and Relics
● Upgrading or ascending characters
● Using Consumables in your Inventory

In Pure Fiction, when characters defeat enemies, they regenerate only <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of the Energy that they would normally do in regular battles.

◆ Gameplay Overview ◆
In the Pure Fiction challenge, non-Boss enemy units will continuously respawn after being defeated. Each time a non-Boss unit is defeated, the Boss unit's HP will be reduced. Defeating the Boss unit allows you to clear that wave.
With each update of Pure Fiction, a unique "Grit Mechanics" system is introduced. When triggered, it allows for rapid accumulation of Grit Value. Once fully charged, player enters the "Surging Grit" phase, gaining powerful stage buffs to defeat enemies!

◆ Grit Value ◆
Methods to accumulate Grit Value includes:
● Defeat enemy units to earn a small amount of Grit Value.
● Trigger the Grit Mechanics in battle to earn a large amount of Grit Value.

◆ Grit Effects ◆
With each update of Pure Fiction, unique Grit Effects are introduced, divided into two different stage buffs: "Concordant Truce" and "Surging Grit."
● At the start of the battle, players are in the Concordant Truce phase, gaining initial buff effects.
● Upon entering the Surging Grit phase, players receive an additional powerful buff unique to that update.
● After the Surging Grit phase, has lasted for a certain amount of action value, the stage reverts to the Concordant Truce phase.
● During the Surging Grit phase, defeating enemy units accumulates "Resurging Tide." At the end of the Surging Grit phase, a portion of Grit Value is returned, up to a limit.

◆ Cacophony ◆
Cacophony updates with various combat after each Pure Fiction update.
You can select one of the buffs for each team before challenging any stage in the Pure Fiction.

◆ Points ◆
In this mode, enemies will appear for a limited number of Cycles. Defeating enemies or dealing DMG to the Boss enemy earns you points.
Each stage contains two battles, namely Node 1 and Node 2. Your final points are the total points earned in both battles, and your highest points will be updated at the end of each battle.

◆ Quick Unlock ◆
All stages in Pure Fiction that have been cleared with a 3-star rating are recorded. When a new event starts, all the cleared stages and their prerequisite stages will be immediately unlocked.
After Quick Unlock takes effect, You can directly challenge the last recorded stage that you passed with 3-stars. Once you have passed that stage with a 3-star rating, all the previous stages will be immediately cleared with a 3-star rating, and all rewards from those stages will be delivered to you.
Currently, only the first 3 stages can be quickly unlocked in this way.

504941497:
◆ Overview ◆
The daily life of the Nameless is not just about majestic trailblazing. It also involves the humdrum of ordinary chores. That being said, how is constructing your own room and developing your own life not a kind of "Trailblaze"?

◆ Event Rules ◆
● During the event, the Trailblazer obtains their own room and gradually enriches the room through renovation and furnishing.
● Renovating the room needs to spend Express Fund and the Trailblazer needs to conduct duties to earn these Funds.
● The Dinner Meeting segment during duty can grant additional Express Fund by reporting the results of this round of duties.

◆ Room Construction ◆
● There are 6 areas in the room, and each area has its independent construction progress.
● Consume Express Funds to complete room construction and increase furnishing rating to obtain rewards.
● You will obtain Blueprints and Decorations during Dinner Meeting. Blueprints and unlock additional furniture to be built, and Decorations can be placed in different places in the room.

◆ Duties ◆
● Five members will make up a Duty Team to earn Express Funds.
● Select different actions and trigger more lucky events during duty can earn more Express Funds.
● More members can be unlocked as more duties are conducted.

◆ Dinner Meeting ◆
● You will enter the Dinner Meeting segment after a period of time during duty.
● During the Dinner Meeting, deliver duty report to Pom-Pom and increase Pom-Pom's evaluation to earn extra Express Fund.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● Complete Room Construction to obtain Build Subsidy rewards.
● Participate in duty enough times in the Duty Planner to obtain rewards.
